_header: The last time I thee well woke
Subjects: carols, amorous; love, vicissitudes of; women, as speakers/narrators
_description: The Betrayed Maiden’s Lament — five quatrains (aaab) and burden (c): ‘I haue forsworne hit whil I life / To wake the well-ey’

CULFf548.First Lines:
The last tyme I the wel wokesir John caght me with a
                    croke…
CULFf548.Last Lines:
…With [ ]ten he fynde hit mylke & papa long while
                    dy
CULFf548.Attributed Author: bryan hyf my name iet (below, f. 114v)
